ai-patthana16.69:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.69:0.3_0: Seeing that how one’s mind is corrupted,
ai-patthana16.69:1.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, consciousness doesn’t give rise to the thought of not-self. It is a cause of desire and lust.
ai-patthana16.69:1.1_1: Not longing for the mind, he doesn’t give rise to the thought of not impingement, nor repulsion. ...
ai-patthana16.69:1.1_2: Some things don’t arise for someone whose mind is not ready, and who has not failed in doing so.
ai-patthana16.69:1.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana16.69:2.1_0: ‘... for the sake of six years.’ ...
